title: Blind Pick Roles.
body:
So I decided to play Blind Pick for a while and not say anything when I got into Champ select. I would simply fill the last role. I skipped games that were remade.

Here are the 25 games I played.

1. Mid
2. Mid
3. Top
4. Top
5. Support
6. Jungle
7. ADC
8. ADC
9. Top
10. Support
11. ADC
12. ADC
13. Top
14. Support
15. ADC
16. Support
17. Support
18. ADC
19. Support
20. Jungle
21. Jungle
22. Top
23. ADC
24. Top
25. Support

I think support showed up most of the time, which is understandable. Though I was surprised at how many people wanted to play it.
Jungle showed up the least. So I guess it's pretty popular.
Just a little experiment I decided to do. X3

replies.body:
This is pretty intresting to see! I know that on average riot posted which roles get picked more often, and the order goes as follows from most popular to least. Although Top and jg are pretty close together

mid
top
Jungler
Adc
Support

Thus far I've had Jungle and Support the most, top and mid comes every now and then, and I've never gotten ADC so far, but I don't think I've played this many (I'm actually looking around for a secondary role since I'm a support main and I have no idea how well I'd do in any other role, so far Jungle has actually been decent compared to my top and mid performances... against a Yasuo both times >,>)
